scenario:
Barry Sternlicht, Chairman & CEO of Starwood Capital Group, will receive the Jonathan Tisch Active Citizenship Award at the 47th annual NYU International Hospitality Investment Forum (NYU IHIF) on June 3, 2025. The award recognizes Sternlicht's positive impact and achievements in the hospitality industry. Sternlicht will also participate in a conversation with Jonathan Tisch, Executive Chairman of Loews Hotels & Co, at the forum.

The NYU IHIF will take place on June 1-3, 2025, at the New York Marriott Marquis in NYC, and will feature keynotes, general sessions, workshops, and networking events with top industry executives. The event will cover the latest trends, economic influences, and projections in the hospitality industry.

New sponsors of the NYU IHIF include Accor, Hilton, Booking.com, Aimbridge, Ashford, BWH Hotels, IHG Hotels & Resorts, Marriott, Turismo De Portugal, Deloitte, CBRE, Choice, Margaritaville, Walker & Dunlop, Actabl, Paul Hasting, Ministry of Tourism Saudi Arabia, Aseer Region Development Authority, Jefferies, Berkadia, PwC, and Morgan Stanley.

The NYU IHIF is operated by Questex, a leading information services and event company, in partnership with the NYU School of Professional Studies (NYU SPS) and its Jonathan M. Tisch Center of Hospitality. The event is expected to deliver unparalleled thought leadership and provide a platform for industry executives to discuss the latest trends and projections in the hospitality industry.
